targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  id
FROM air_condition
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date_time)
ORDER BY date_time

options.content: Weather for the Following Location: Athens, Greece

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",

FROM air_condition
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date_time)
ORDER BY date_time

options.content:

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  id
FROM air_condition
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date_time)
ORDER BY date_time

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status 
FROM alarm
ORDER BY date_time DESC 
LIMIT 1

select ms.name ,count(*)
from alarm a
left join magnet_sensor ms 
on a.date_time = ms.date_time 
where a.status  = 1 and ms.status = 1 
GROUP BY ms.name

panels.title: Number of possible breaches per Magnet Sensor

targets.rawSql: select name,count(name) from smoke_sensor where status = 1 group by name;

select ms.name ,count(*)
from alarm a
left join motion_sensor ms 
on a.date_time = ms.date_time 
where a.status  = 1 and ms.status = 1 
GROUP BY ms.name

panels.title: Number of possible breaches per Motion Sensor

panels.description: The Lamps Panel displays the latest  status of each lamp

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status as "Bedroom Lamp -",
  description
FROM lamp
WHERE
  name = 'lamp0'
ORDER BY date_time DESC 
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status as "Living room Lamp -",
  description
FROM lamp
WHERE
  name = 'lamp1'
ORDER BY date_time DESC 
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status as "Kitchen Lamp -",
  description
FROM lamp
WHERE
  name = 'lamp2'
ORDER BY date_time DESC 
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status as "Bathroom Lamp -",
  description
FROM lamp
WHERE
  name = 'lamp3'
ORDER BY date_time DESC 
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status as "Balcony Lamp -",
  description
FROM lamp
WHERE
  name = 'lamp4'
ORDER BY date_time DESC 
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Lamps

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  lm AS "Bedroom"
FROM light_sensor
WHERE
  name = 'sensorLight0'
ORDER BY date_time

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  lm AS "Living Room"
FROM light_sensor
WHERE
  name = 'sensorLight1'
ORDER BY date_time

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  lm AS "Balcony"
FROM light_sensor
WHERE
  name = 'sensorLight4'
ORDER BY date_time

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status as "Thermostat -",
  description
FROM thermostat
ORDER BY date_time DESC 
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status as "Bedroom A/C -",
  description
FROM air_condition
WHERE name = "AC0"
ORDER BY date_time DESC 
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status as "Living Room A/C -",
  description
FROM air_condition
WHERE name = "AC1"
ORDER BY date_time DESC 
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  temp AS "Bedroom"
FROM temp_sensor
WHERE
  name = 'sensorTemp0'
ORDER BY date_time

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  temp AS "Living Room"
FROM temp_sensor
WHERE
  name = 'sensorTemp1'
ORDER BY date_time

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  temp as "Bedroom Temp"
FROM temp_sensor
WHERE
  name = 'sensorTemp0'
ORDER BY date_time DESC 
LIMIT 1
SELECT AVG(temp) as "Bedroom AVG Temp", MAX(date_time) as "time" FROM temp_sensor WHERE name = 'sensorTemp0'

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  temp as "Living Room Temp"
FROM temp_sensor
WHERE
  name = 'sensorTemp1'
ORDER BY date_time DESC 
LIMIT 1
SELECT AVG(temp) as "Living Room AVG Temp", MAX(date_time) as "time" FROM temp_sensor WHERE name = 'sensorTemp1'

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status AS "Thermostat"
FROM thermostat
ORDER BY date_time

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status AS "Bedroom A/C"
FROM air_condition
WHERE name = "AC0"
ORDER BY date_time

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status AS "Living Room  A/C"
FROM air_condition
WHERE name = "AC1"
ORDER BY date_time

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status as "Vacuum -",
  description
FROM vacuum
ORDER BY date_time DESC 
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status as "Phone Charger -",
  description
FROM switch
WHERE name = "switch0"
ORDER BY date_time DESC 
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status as "Coffee Maker -",
  description
FROM switch
WHERE name = "switch1"
ORDER BY date_time DESC 
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status as "Water Heater -",
  description
FROM water_heater
ORDER BY date_time DESC 
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status AS "Water Heater"
FROM water_heater
ORDER BY date_time

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status AS "Phone Charger"
FROM switch
where name = "switch0"
ORDER BY date_time

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status AS "Coffee Maker"
FROM switch
where name = "switch1"
ORDER BY date_time

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  status AS "Vacuum Cleaner"
FROM vacuum
ORDER BY date_time

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  description
FROM siren
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date_time) AND
  status = '1'
ORDER BY date_time

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  description
FROM smoke_sensor
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date_time) AND
  status = '1'
ORDER BY date_time

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  description
FROM temp_sensor
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(date_time) AND
  temp_dif > 5
ORDER BY date_time
